reviews.text: since they withdrew bank accounts and closed most of the branches they have changed as a company. Service is definitely poor now .

reviews.title: Tried to change terms and conditions, very unhelpful
reviews.text: 2 accounts, 1 always a good balance, would not let me change terms for 2nd account, very disappointed.

reviews.title: no foreign bank charges
reviews.text: One of the few banks that don't charge for withdrawing cash abroad

reviews.title: Shocking
reviews.text: From refusing to provide telephone advice about a suitable account I could transfer a large sum of into; it was impossible to visit a branch as I had moved to London, and have poor computer/internet skills so couldn't open an internet account, this mattered not a jot. Either visit a branch or open an internet account. Very limiting. And now they have accused me of providing a fraudulent document - it certainly isn't, and they are ignoring the assurance of a solicitor on the matter. Essentially, they are accusing me of being a criminal. Because of this they have prevented me from taking up a work offer in Spain. And last but not least, most of the branch staff are helpful and polite but I had the misfortune of dealing with one very rude member of staff a couple of years ago. My advice is to take your money elsewhere

reviews.title: ATMs abroad
reviews.text: Great for getting commission-free money out of ATMs abroad

reviews.title: Poor IT Systems and Customer Service
reviews.text: After a month since opening an account, when I was trying to logon online, I seem to have mis typed my password. Without any warning my account got locked after 3 attempts. When I called the customer service they asked me for a telephone password to unlock my online account. I didn't know what it was and the customer service person didn't give any other alternate option to unlock it through the phone. She advised that I need to set a password for telephone banking through post first and then call them back to reset the online account. This seem to be lengthy and frustrating and something unheard of.

reviews.title: Excellent customer service and polite staff
reviews.text: My experience of norwhich and peterborough has been delightful one. Opening account was easy and straightforward. The staff are helpful and waiting times are reasonable. I was diagnosed with a mental illness. Due to my illness I had occurred overdraft charges, with the bank. I informed of this with supporting evidence. The bank was very sympathetic and refunded the charges. I delighted to say I am still a loyal customer of theirs.

reviews.title: Easy to access and great service
reviews.text: I have had only positive experiences with N&P and their current accounts. Their online banking is fantastic as well as the staff being incredibly polite via phone and inside the bank. Brilliant service

reviews.title: Regular Saver account
reviews.text: I have a family regular saver that means i have to put Â£250 into my account every month. Although the interest rate isnt any better than anywhere else you get a bonus every year for not touching the money which means a tidy amount every year

reviews.title: in control of my savings.
reviews.text: I am very happy with the service I receive. I love being able to deposit and withdraw as and when. The staff in my local branch are all very friendly and chatty which is always nice.

reviews.title: Free Cash Withdrawals While Abroad
reviews.text: I have this account purely because they don't charge a premium when withdrawing money from cash machines abroad. You have to make five transactions a month to keep the account free, but I simply have a standing order every week, and another every month, to pay in a small amount.
